ygData.subject: RE: A question about Enchant Silver
ygData.msgSnippet: I would recommend asking a dark elf to get it for you.  While it s true you can wait for your dark elf illusion spell and invis yourself to the guards you
ygData.messageBody:
I would recommend asking a dark elf to get it for you. While it's true you
can wait for your dark elf illusion spell and invis yourself to the guards
you won't know the way through the maze that is neriak. The library is in a
zone called "The 3rd Gate" which is two zones in from the 1st neriak city
zone. You probably won't want to be wandering around in there any longer
than necessary so trying to find your way won't be much fun knowing your
spells could fail at any time. Many new dark elves ask for help navigating
through the city.

With the change a while back to allow multiple copies of spells to be
carried you may find someone to sell it to you. I'd make a button to
/auction Buying enchant silver spell and let a savvy businessperson help you
out.

good luck to you,
Shawn
Flarfian, lvl 17 dark elf necromancer

-----Original Message-----
From: Christine Greenwald [mailto:ChrisRAV4@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 6:51 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] A question about Enchant Silver


From: Christine Greenwald <ChrisRAV4@...>

Hi everyone-

I've been lurking on the list for the last week or so and have found your
discussions very valuable as a beginning jeweler. Last night I made level 8
and would like to obtain the Enchant Silver spell. It is my understanding
the
spell is located in the Library in Neriak, a place to which I haven't been.

My question is: as a high-elf enchanter, am I KOS in Neriak? (I'm betting
probably so...) If so, what strategies did you use to obtain the spell? I
have
not seen anyone in in Greater Faydark selling the spell on the Erollisi Marr
server.

Your comments will be most helpful. Thanks!


Christine
known Minbari on Erollisi Marr
